column1: Baby Barnaby's////As many others have mentioned
column2: portions are quite generous. Go with it
column3: since the food is so good! Definitely lots of comfort breakfast foods to be found--pancakes
column8: and eggs made however you like them. (Scrambled with a little cheese
column9: please!) If you want to start the day a little healthier
column10: they have lots of other options--the low fat
column15: I say!)--there's something for just about everyone here.
